lead_paragraph: The inquiry will look into whether Blackwater officials used bribes to retain work after a 2007 shooting in Iraq.
snippet: The inquiry will look into whether Blackwater officials used bribes to retain work after a 2007 shooting in Iraq.

headline.main: U.S. Examines Whether Blackwater Tried Bribery
headline.print_headline: BRIBERY AT ISSUE AS INQUIRY LOOKS INTO BLACKWATER
headline.sub: Questions on Payments Said to Go to Iraqi Officials  ;

byline.original: By MARK MAZZETTI and JAMES RISEN
byline.contributor: Steven Lee Myers contributed reporting from Baghdad.
